trend: Facts that change how you see reality
hook: This is why you feel stuck.
script:
HOOK (0–3s):
This is why you feel stuck.

MAIN (3–50s):
Most people don’t realize that facts that change how you see reality.
Your brain filters reality to save energy.
That means it deletes details, distorts time,
and prioritizes comfort over truth.
This isn’t a flaw — it’s survival.

CTA (last 5s):
Once you see this, you can’t unsee it.
captions: This is why you feel stuck.
post_caption: This is why you feel stuck. #psychology #mind #didyouknow #shorts
